tool.name: Modify Parameters
tool.description: Modify Parameters in a Data Model.
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool supports changing parameter fields in a CellBlender data model and saving the changes to a new data model.
This tool uses a somewhat cumbersome interface that requires the user to know the names of the parameters to be changed.
* **Step 0**: Use the "Show Data Model" tool (or any other tool) to note the names of parameters in the JSON data model. * **Step 1**: Use this tool to select the JSON data model data set to modify (usually the same one from Step 0). * **Step 2**: Use the "Insert" button to add a new MCell parameter change block for each parameter to be changed. * **Step 3**: Type in the Parameter Name and Parameter Value fields. * **Step 4**: Use the "Execute" button to build the new data model based on the original with the changes added.
Note that this tool can change existing parameters and also add new parameters.
------
**Citation**
If you use this tool, please cite `Bartol T.M.; MCell ... . <http://www.mcell.org>`_
